channel.title: Azure Active Directory Domain Services on Michael Schnerring
channel.description: Recent content in Azure Active Directory Domain Services on Michael Schnerring

item.title: Deploy Azure Virtual Desktop (AVD) Using Terraform and Azure Active Directory Domain Services (AADDS)
item.description: With Azure Virtual Desktop (AVD), you can deliver secure Windows 11 desktops and environments anywhere. It’s pretty easy to deploy and scale. You can provide a coherent user experience from any end-user device and reduce costs by leveraging Windows 11 multi-session licensing. This tutorial will guide you through setting up AVD with AADDS using Terraform.

item.title: Set Up Azure Active Directory Domain Services (AADDS) With Terraform
item.description: I wanted to revisit this topic for a while because the previous guide I wrote about setting up Azure Active Directory Domain Services (AADDS) with Terraform is outdated. However, the article still attracts around 100 visitors per month. People also keep downloading the deprecated Terraform module I created. Time to set things right!

item.title: Set Up Azure Active Directory Domain Services (AADDS) with Terraform
item.description:
